article.headline: La Salle 75, Duquesne 66
article.story: PITTSBURGH (AP) -- Jermaine Thomas had a season-high 20 points as LaSalle beat Duquesne 75-66 Wednesday night. Darnell Harris added 12 points and Steven Smith 11 for the Explorers (12-7, 4-4 Atlantic 10), who pulled away with a 13-1 run late in the first half and never trailed in the contest. LaSalle has won two in a row since snapping a five-game losing streak Sunday against Massachusetts. Bryant McAllister had 20 points to lead Duquesne (3-16, 1-7), which trailed by at least 9 points throughout the second half. DeVario Hudson and Aaron Jackson each added 15 points for Duquesne. Duquesne was already down to a nine-player roster before starting center Keith Gayden sprained his left wrist when he slipped and fell on campus Wednesday afternoon. Gayden played only nine minutes. The Dukes, who had lost nine in a row before a win at St. Bonaventure Saturday, shot 41 percent from the field, but just 31 percent in the first half. Duquesne did not hit a field goal for almost six minutes to start the game. La Salle held a 40-29 rebounding advantage and 7-1 advantage in steals. The Explorers, who beat Duquesne at home 84-61 Jan 4., swept the season series after the Dukes won both meetings last season. La Salle has won eight of the past 10 meetings. Thomas' career high of 33 points also came against Duquesne, on Feb. 23 in Pittsburgh.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
